```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(rstanarm)

```

```{r}
crimegdpfile %>%
  select(state, gdp_id, gdp_capita) %>% 
  group_by(state) %>% 
  summarize(mean_gdp_id = mean(gdp_id), 
            mean_gdp_capita = mean(gdp_capita)) %>% 
  arrange(mean_gdp_id) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = mean_gdp_id, mean_gdp_capita)) +
  geom_col()

```
```{r}
crime_gdp %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = gdp_id, y = big_crime_per_capita)) +
  geom_point(alpha = .5) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") 
```
